name: pouchdb-nextjs-router
description: A next.js API submodule with a CouchDB style REST interface to PouchDB
author: jpbourgeon <jeanphilippe.bourgeon@gmail.com> (https://github.com/jpbourgeon)

scripts.benchmark: npm run test:setup && BENCHMARK=1 npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
scripts.build:commonjs: rimraf dist && babel --plugins transform-remove-console lib --out-dir dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.test:custom: npm run test:setup && npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
scripts.test:express: npm run test:setup && SERVER=express npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && SERVER=pouchdb-nextjs-router npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
scripts.time:custom: npm run test:setup && TIME=1 npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
scripts.time:express: npm run test:setup && TIME=1 SERVER=express npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
scripts.time: npm run test:setup && TIME=1 SERVER=pouchdb-nextjs-router npm run test --prefix ../pouchdb
